title: "Verge.io adds GPU virtualization to its HCI software"
excerpt: "Verge.io, formerly known as Yottabyte, has added GPU virtualization to its virtual data-center software, making it possible to partition out GPU-based processing tasks the same way a hypervisor divides up a CPU."
